sections.heading: Quarantine of infected and diseased plants; notice; hearing3-203
sections.text: Quarantine of infected and diseased plants; notice; hearingA. When a plant or any other thing is found infested or infected by or to contain or harbor a crop pest or disease, the director shall place thereon a written warning or notice
